module.title: Resource: Cache
module.description:
Cache resource.
This is a wrapper using <abbr title="Storage Engine Abstraction">SEA</abbr> (part of cmModules).
module.author: Christian Würker
module.sql: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS `<%?prefix%>cache`; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>cache` ( `cacheId` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `context` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `hash` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `value` mediumtext COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, `timestamp` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `expiration` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`cacheId`), KEY `context` (`context`), KEY `hash` (`hash`), KEY `timestamp` (`timestamp`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;
